Obsoletions for 18.0

18.0

Type Name Description
Method CopyProfilePageMetadata Use procedure CopyProfile instead, which also handles copying page metadata.
Field Invoicing Microsoft Invoicing is not supported on Business Central
Field Invoicing Microsoft Invoicing is not supported on Business Central
Field "Error Message 2" Error Message field size has been increased
Field "Error Message 3" Error Message field size has been increased
Field "Error Message 4" Error Message field size has been increased
Table System.Environment.Configuration."Profile Resource Import/Export" Importing and exporting profile resources is no longer supported. AL profiles and customizations should be used instead.
Table System.Reflection."MS-Event Emitter Event Codes" Deprecated
Codeunit System.Integration."Web Service Helper" This codeunit will be removed once OData V3 is deprecated
Table System.EMail."Email Attachment" We are reverting the fix that was using this table as it was not possible to solve the problem this way.
Field Password Password should not be stored in a table, use SetCertPassword procedure on Certificate Management codeunit
Field "Is Parent" Is not used anomore

Field "Node Name" Is not used anymore
Field "Has Attributes" Is not used anymore
Field "On Hold Due to Inactivity" Functionality moved into new job queue status
